articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Apple offers to open iPhone NFC payments to third-party providers after EU investigation - The Verge
articles.description: Apple will let third-party mobile wallet and payment providers access the iPhone’s NFC as part of proposals to address a European Commission antitrust investigation.
articles.content:

articles.title: JPMorgan's praise for “talented” banker with $34.5m bonus - eFinancialCareers
articles.description: JPMorgan is becoming increasingly effusive in its praise while remaining liberal in its generosity.
articles.content: In the words of Benjamin Disraeli, everyone loves flattery, and when it comes to Royalty, you should lay it on with a trowel.  Jamie Dimon isnt quite royalty (although most estimates suggest hes rich… [+6468 chars]
